parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of vertices in this body

title: IBody2.IGetVertices
description: Gets the vertices in this body.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of vertices in this body

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of vertices in this body VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IBody2::GetVertexCount
to determine the size of the array.
